text:
(a)     Failure to meet continuing eligibility requirements, absent a showing of good cause, other than compliance with the PAES Plan, shall result in the imposition of a 60 day sanction. 
     (b)     Failure to comply with all the components of the PAES Plan shall result in the imposition of a 90 day sanction.
     (c)     Time spent serving PAES sanctions shall not apply in computing the time limit for PAES services specified in this Article.
(Added by Ord. 150-98, App. 5/8/98)
